text: The Perils of Pauline may refer to: * The Perils of Pauline (1914 serial), a silent film serial * The Perils of Pauline (1933 serial), a film serial from Universal Studios * The Perils of Pauline (1947 film), from Paramount Pictures * The Perils of Pauline (1967 film), from Universal Pictures
title: The Perils of Pauline
